meanings: (움직임, 동작) [명사] activity, [동사] move, do, be active

examples.korean: The volcano has been inactive for 50 years. 발음듣기 그 화산은 50년 동안 활동을 하지 않고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The volcano has been inactive for 50 years. 발음

examples.korean: Coursework accounts for 40% of the final marks. 발음듣기 수업 활동이 기말 성적의 40%를 차지한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Coursework accounts for 40% of the final marks. 발음

examples.korean: Local activities include walking, boating and golf. 발음듣기 지역에서 할 수 있는 활동으로는 걷기, 보트 타기, 골프 등이 있습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Local activities include walking, boating and golf. 발음

examples.korean: The activities on offer include sailing and mountain biking. 발음듣기 제공되는 여가 활동에는 배 타기와 산악자전거 타기도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The activities on offer include sailing and mountain biking. 발음

examples.korean: She retailed the neighbours’ activities with relish. 발음듣기 그녀는 이웃 사람들의 활동을 맛깔스럽게 들려주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She retailed the neighbours’ activities with relish. 발음
